summary: Removes the enchantment cost from Daedric artifacts.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.0
11 March 2012

Being artifacts of all-powerful beings, I thought it was kind of silly that most of the Daedric artifacts had limited charges. Ergo, I made this simple mod that removes the enchantment cost of the artifacts.

Items affected:
- Dawnbreaker
- Mace of Molag Bal
- Sanguine Rose
- Skull of Corruption
- Volendrung
- Wabbajack

Note: Ebony Blade and Mehrunes\' Razor already had unlimited charges, so no point in fixing what isn\'t broken.

Installation (NMM installation is preferred)
1. Download the .zip to an arbitrary location.
2. Extract the .esp and move it to your Data folder. (usually C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\Skyrim\\Data or C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data)
3. Activate the mod through the launcher\'s Data Files option.
4. Enjoy!
author: Necromanteion
